In this universe of LAMP, there are five warm asteroids: Performance Department, Public Relations Department, Propaganda Department, Activity Department and Orchestra. åœ¨LAMPçš„å®˜æ–¹è§£é‡‹ä¸­ï¼šL-lifeï¼ŒA-andï¼ŒM-musicï¼ŒP-performance. ä¸€è·¯èµ°ä¾†ï¼ŒLAMPåº¦éå¥¹çš„åä¸‰å€‹æ˜¥ç§‹ã€‚åœ¨é€™è£¡ï¼Œæœ‰å¹•å‰çš„éœ“è™¹é–ƒçˆï¼Œä¹Ÿæœ‰å¹•å¾Œçš„é»ç‡ˆåŒè¡Œã€‚ Highlights Performance Departmentï¼šç©è½‰éŸ³æ¨‚çš„LAMPé‡‘è©±ç­’ï½œR&B Rap æµè¡Œ æ°‘è¬ æ–æ»¾ ååˆ†å¤šå…ƒ Public Relations Departmentï¼šLAMPç¬¬ä¸€ç”Ÿç”¢åŠ›ï½œèˆ‡é‡‘ä¸»çˆ¸çˆ¸å€‘é¬¥æ™ºé¬¥å‹‡çš„åæ´¾è§’è‰² Propaganda Departmentï¼šLAMPç¬¬ä¸€è¨˜éŒ„è€…ï½œè‡´åŠ›è®“å…¨å®‡å®™éƒ½è½åˆ°LAMPçš„è²éŸ³ Activity Departmentï¼šçµ±é ˜å…¨å±€ï¼ŒæŒæ§å…¨å ´ï½œä½ çœ‹åˆ°çš„èˆå°ï¼Œç”±æˆ‘å€‘é»äº® Orchestraï¼šLAMPæ¨‚åœ˜ï¼Œç„¡æ¨‚ä¸åšï½œæ”¾é£›è‡ªæˆ‘ï¼Œéœ‡ç¿»æ’ç·´å®¤ My Role As the minister of the propaganda department, I am in charge of the editorial promotion and regular maintenance of the WeChat official account of Beijing Jiaotong University LAMP Music Association Have published 25 passages with illustrations and texts, accumulating 2.

item.title: Shared Study Room WeChat Mini Program
item.description: A Wechat Mini Program which allows students to book shared study rooms and find study partners. Project from National Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training For College Students Overview Brief Introduction Based on people’s thirst for knowledge in today’s society and the rise of the sharing economy, especially the increasing demand of college students for study rooms, we try to create a study room with a higher degree of freedom and more satisfying user experience.

item.title: Internship as Community Operation at ByteDance
item.description: Xiaohe Health is a medical and health care brand under ByteDance. It cooperates with authoritative medical institutions and experts at home and abroad to jointly build more than 800 categories and more than 40 million structured content in the medical and health field, popular science articles on health knowledge, expert Q&A and videos. It provides users with an authoritative and understandable medical and health content library. Overview Brief Introduction Intending to truly understand how big data and algorithms could be used to conduct â€œthe art of persuasionâ€ to the target users through social media, I chose to undertake my internship at the Department of Content Operations in ByteDance.

item.title: Research Experience
item.description: 1. Overview 1.1 Brief Introduction Social media has provided multiple ways for individuals and organizations to connect and communicate with each other. Social media platforms such as WeChat, Weibo, and webcasting platforms are widely used in the public’s daily life and dominate the media. These media are often simple to use, have low barriers to use, and are updated quickly, allowing for timely publication and quicker feedback. In this context, Professor Wang of the City University of Hong Kong sponsored this academic research project.
